FilterBadChannels.cc

00001 #include "FilterBadChannels.hh"
00002 #include "marlin/ConditionsProcessor.h"
00003 #include "EVENT/CalorimeterHit.h"
00004 #include "EVENT/LCCollection.h"
00005 #include "EVENT/LCParameters.h"
00006 #include "IMPL/LCCollectionVec.h"
00007 
00008 namespace CALICE
00009 {
00010 
00011 FilterBadChannels aFilterBadChannels;
00012 
00013 FilterBadChannels::FilterBadChannels() : marlin::Processor("FilterBadChannels"){
00014   registerInputCollection( LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT,
00015                            "InputCollection",
00016                            "Name of input hit collection",
00017                            _inColName,
00018                            std::string( "CalorimeterHits" ) );
00019 
00020   registerOutputCollection( LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT,
00021                             "OutputCollection",
00022                             "Name of filtered hit collection",
00023                             _outColName,
00024                             std::string( "FilteredCalorimeterHits" ) );
00025 
00026   registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00027                            "CellQuality",
00028                            "Collection with qiuality flags",
00029                            _statusColName,
00030                            std::string( "CellQuality" ) );
00031   _description = "Filter hits from bad cells out of list of CalorimeterHits";
00032 
00033 }
00034 
00035 FilterBadChannels::~FilterBadChannels(){
00036 }
00037 
00038 void FilterBadChannels::init(){
00039   printParameters();
00040 
00041   _statusMap = new Map_t( &CellQuality::getCellID );
00042 
00043   marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( _statusMap, 
00044                                                        _statusColName );
00045 }
00046 
00047 void FilterBadChannels::processEvent(LCEvent *evt){
00048   EVENT::LCCollection* inCol = 0;
00049   try {
00050     inCol = evt->getCollection( _inColName );
00051   } catch ( lcio::DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
00052   }
00053   
00054   if ( inCol ) {
00055     IMPL::LCCollectionVec* outCol = 
00056       new IMPL::LCCollectionVec( LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT );
00057     outCol->setFlag( inCol->getFlag() );
00058     outCol->setSubset( true );
00059     std::string encStr = 
00060       inCol->getParameters().getStringVal( LCIO::CellIDEncoding ) ;
00061     outCol->parameters().setValue( LCIO::CellIDEncoding, encStr );
00062     for ( int i=0; i!= inCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i ){
00063       EVENT::CalorimeterHit* hit = 
00064         dynamic_cast< EVENT::CalorimeterHit* >( inCol->getElementAt( i ) );
00065       if ( hit ) {
00066         if ( _statusMap->map().find( hit->getCellID1() ) ==
00067              _statusMap->map().end() )
00068           outCol->addElement( hit );
00069       }
00070     }
00071     evt->addCollection( outCol, _outColName );
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 void FilterBadChannels::end(){
00076 }
00077 
00078 } // namespace CALICE
